articles.title: Celebrations Held Abroad
Kim Jong Il Lauded
Syrian Party Leader on Friendly Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Syrian Party Leader on Friendly Relations with DPRK 
    Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Youssef Faisal, general secretary of the Communist Party of Syria, referred to the friendly relations with the DPRK when meeting DPRK ambassador to Syria Kim Hyong Jun who paid a farewell call on him.
 He said that the friendly relations between the Communist Party of Syria and the Workers' Party of Korea and between the peoples of the two countries are the bonds in which they have struggled for the common cause, rejecting the aggression and domination of the imperialists and the ties of fraternity between the peoples who have sincerely supported each other.    
 The members of the Communist Party of Syria and the Syrian people will as ever support the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their cause of the struggle against the U.S. imperialists and socialist construction and strengthen the unity and solidarity with the Workers' Party of Korea, he said.

articles.title: KCNA Assails Japanese Ruling Party Heavyweight's Anti-DPRK Outburst
Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Austria
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Austria 
    Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Some Problems of Education in the Juche Idea" was published in pamphlet by the Joseph Gebauer Publishing House of Vienna on Jan. 30.
 This work, published on July 15, Juche 75 (1986) clarified theoretical and practical issues in improving the ideological work of the party such as the issue of making the scientific accuracy and truth of the world outlook of Juche and all forms of ideological education run through the contents of the education of the Juche idea, the issue of turning and revolutionary outlook on the leader into one's view on life, the issue of having a correct understanding of the advantages of the socialist economic system.    
 The pamphlet has the following preface: "We have the pleasure to bring out the work of HE Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on the occasion of his birthday.
